messages.message:
Hey team,

We are planning to deprecate the usage of TensorFlow in model-training and model-service.

After consulting with the model-dev team (@Rafal @SÅ‚awek Biel @Bartosz Topolski @Nikolaos Kofinas), we have confirmed that no models are currently being trained using TensorFlow. Additionally, we checked the signature, bank statement, and sentence similarity models in the marketplace admin, and none of them rely on TensorFlow either.
Considering recent developments, TensorFlow has announced that they will no longer support Python 3.7, not even for vulnerability updates (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/60176) (cc @shaunak). In light of this, we have decided to deprecate the TensorFlow dependency from our model-training and model-service code base as it will be difficult to maintain in the future.

If you foresee any potential issues or have any concerns, please let us know as soon as possible. We want to ensure a smooth transition and address any challenges proactively. Thanks!
cc @Heymian @lydia
Just FYI, we are using tensorboard though for logging, hope thats not removed
it's not it is an independent package
